translations: n.柯利牧羊犬（collie 的复数）
v.（用煤烟、烟灰）把……弄黑（colly 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: I had heard once that collies love children.
sentences.translation: 我曾听说过那头大柯利牧羊犬喜欢孩子。

sentences.sentence: Collies, smart, watch over the flock, pen, take care of, probably, safe.
sentences.translation: 牧羊犬，聪明的，照看羊群，围栏，照看，可能的，安全。

sentences.sentence: An extremely healthy breed, Border Collies are susceptible only to a few disorders. One is Collie Eye Anomaly (CEA).
sentences.translation: 博德牧羊犬是极为健康的一种狗狗，仅容易犯几种紊乱症状。一种是柯利犬眼部异常(CEA)。
